page_content: The page contains various news and updates related to the Kanton Solothurn.
The page reports an incident on the A5 highway where a self-accident occurred and the responsible party left without reporting.
The page discusses financial planning tools for municipalities, including an Excel application for accounting.
The page discusses a digital infrastructure project for museums in various cantons.
The page contains various news and updates related to the Kanton Solothurn, including topics like education, employment, and financial regulations.
The page describes the two-phase model for asylum seekers in Kanton Solothurn.
The page discusses the efficient and clean use of wood for heating.
The page discusses a regional drainage plan and invites stakeholders to review and provide feedback.
